alert.note: Alert for Audrain; Callaway (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 06 at 7:58AM CDT until May 06 at 8:45AM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: The National Weather Service in St Louis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Audrain County in central Missouri... Northwestern Callaway County in central Missouri... * Until 845 AM CDT. * At 758 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Murry, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Mexico, Auxvasse, Vandiver, and Hatton. This includes Interstate 70 in Missouri near exit 137. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
